Trade/Device Name(s): Contour NEXT USB Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Contour NEXT USB Blood Glucose Meter
Contour NEXT Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Contour NEXT USB Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Contour NEXT USB Blood Glucose Monitoring System and associated diabetes management software for home blood glucose measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood from fingertip and palm for single-patient home use; monitoring diabetes control program; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
